The chart above shows the plate area and separation for four different air-filled parallel-plate capacitors: K, L, M, and N.
content.question: Each capacitor is charged such that the same potential difference exists across the plates. Which of the following correctly ranks the magnitude of electric field between the plates of each capacitor?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
